org.sakaiproject.entity.api

Interface ContextObserver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RWikiObjectService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAnnouncementService, BaseCalendarService, BaseContentService, BaseMailArchiveService, DbAnnouncementService, DbCalendarService, DbContentService, DbMailArchiveService, DropboxContextObserver, GradebookEntityProducer, RWikiObjectServiceImpl

    public interface ContextObserver

    Services which implement ContextObserver declare themselves as wanting context change notification.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void contextCreated(String context, boolean toolPlacement)
      This is called when a context is first created.
      void contextDeleted(String context, boolean toolPlacement)
      This is called when a context is being deleted.
      void contextUpdated(String context, boolean toolPlacement)
      This is called when a context is changed.
      String[] myToolIds()
      Provide the string array of tool ids, for tools that we need context preperation for.

    • Method Detail

      • contextCreated

        void contextCreated(String context,
                  boolean toolPlacement)
        This is called when a context is first created.
        Parameters:
        context - The context id.
        toolPlacement - true if one of your tool is placed in the context.

      • contextUpdated

        void contextUpdated(String context,
                  boolean toolPlacement)
        This is called when a context is changed.
        Parameters:
        context - The context id.
        toolPlacement - true if one of your tool is placed in the context after the change.

      • contextDeleted

        void contextDeleted(String context,
                  boolean toolPlacement)
        This is called when a context is being deleted.
        Parameters:
        context - The context id.
        toolPlacement - true if one of your tool is placed in the context after the change.

      • myToolIds

        String[] myToolIds()
        Provide the string array of tool ids, for tools that we need context preperation for.
        Returns:
